summary: lags much? now you can actually remove grass or tree in skyrim, also there is option to remove light effects such a flicker effect. compatible everything and all safe to remove.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][size=2]created with version 1.9.32.0.8[/size][/size][i][size=3]

Ever dreamed to play with high framerates? your computer can't handle this game? fear no more[/size][/i]...
____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#d9ead3][size=5]"WHY I SHOULD USE THIS MOD?"[/size][/color]
[color=#00ff00][size=5]*[/size][/color]you are here because you want more performance..
[color=#00ff00][size=5]*[/size][/color]its very simple mod but you can't find it anywhere else..
[color=#00ff00][size=5]*[/size][/color]it doesn't heavy modified and safe to remove anytime..

[color=#93c47d][size=4]"WHY I DON'T WANT USE THIS MOD?"[/size][/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]*[/size][/color]because your computer is "AWESOME" enough to play at medium settings
[color=#ff0000][size=5]*[/size][/color]you don't want to play the game like in the wasteland[size=1][size=2](its fine! probably you already fallout 3 veteran)[/size]

[size=4][color=#6aa84f]"BUT I WANT GRASS!!! YOU CAN'T DO THIS TO ME!"[/color]
[/size][/size]I found out grass doesn't lag with [b]"Skyrimaguas[/b]" mod;
install and use "iMinGrassSize=150" in skyrim.ini and give some thanks to him:
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33582/]"Grass on Steroids"[/url][/size]

[b][color=#00ff00][size=5] F E A T U R E S[/size][/color][/b]

[color=#ffd966][size=4][b][i]Remove foliage[/i][/b][/size][/color]
My reason to makes this, people trying to remove grass but actually you cannot remove all foliage in Tamriel (until you open up CreationKit) and no one made this mod before as much as I know. its very simple mod it just hide all grass plants in exterior. it doesn't remove collectible plants or remove any files/folders, so its safe to remove. They will come back when you disable my mods.

[color=#00ff00][i][b]note:[/b][/i][/color]
This mod doesn't remove grass it removes foliage in Skyrim they are not counted as "grass" there is difference between that!

[color=#ff0000][i]note:[/i][/color]
some foliage not removed because some referance's using those, I didnt remove them so it won't hurt your game. they will be visible tho..
don't worry, still removed foliage a lot of bigger then them.

[color=#ffd966][size=4][b][i]Remove tree[/i][/b][/size][/color]
this will give noticeable performance boost but costs wasteland feeling, there is not much to tell..

[color=#ffd966][size=4][b][i]Remove light effects [/i][/b][/size][/color]
this will give slightly more performance
did you know how many lights rendered moving and flickering around?!
exactly!
I dont have any idea too, but im sure it gives more frame rate :D

[b][color=#00ff00][size=5] I N S T A L L[/size][/color][/b]
put esp files inside your "skyrim/data" folder and activate them in launcher.. you can activate them in any order..

[color=#ff7700][b][size=5] U N I N S T A L L[/size][/b] [/color] 
delete or deactivate esp files :(  don't worry your save files safe

[i][b][color=#6fa8dc]other notes:[/color][/b][/i]
my computer spec: intel pentium dual cpu e2180 2.0GHz  ati x1550  2GB RAM win7 32bit

didn't tried with lush trees mod, it could give some problems but if you are trying this mod, you should know lush trees for high end computers
author: Platoon
